data.title: Yet another socio-fantasy film in the making
data.meta_description: Telugu cinema news, Movie reviews, OTT News, OTT Release dates, Latest Movie reviews in Telugu, telugu movie reviews, Box office collections
data.text:
Young actors Akash Sahadev and Mishti Chakraborthy have teamed up for their latest socio-fantasy film called Sharabha. Latest update reveals that the talkie part of the film has been completed.

The unit will be heading to Italy to can two songs there. Director Shankarâ€™s assistant, S Narasimha Rao is directing this film which is being made in Tamil and Telugu on a huge scale.

The makers are in due plans to dub the film in Hindi as well. Jayaprada and Nepolean play crucial roles in this film which also has Nasser and Sayaji Shinde. Music of the film is composed by Koti and Raman Selva is the cameraman.

Hollywood makeup artists San Foot has done special get-ups for this film which will some striking visuals. More details of this film will be revealed soon.
